title: Garmin vívoactive 3: The Smartwatch That Lets You Pay and Play
description:
From the running trail to the coffee shop, vívoactive 3 is making it easier to play and pay your way. With built-in GPS, more than 15 preloaded activities and the new Garmin Pay™ feature1, you can leave your phone and wallet at home. Find out more about this stylish smartwatch here:  https://buy.garmin.com/en-US/US/p/571520.
• Garmin Pay lets you make secure contactless payments with your watch
• Features more than 15 preloaded sports apps, including yoga, running and more – no phone connection required
• Includes fitness monitoring, such as VO2 max and fitness age estimate, plus all-day stress tracking
• Get connected features2 such as smart notifications, music controls and more
• Personalize your watch with free watch faces, apps and widgets from the Connect IQ™ store
• Battery life3: up to 7 days in smartwatch mode; 13 hours in GPS mode

1Available for supported cards from participating banks; contact your bank for more information. Only available at NFC-enabled terminals. View current supported country, payment network and issuing bank information at Garmin.com/GarminPay
2When paired with a compatible smartphone; see Garmin.com/ble
3Battery life may vary depending on usage
